title: No popup menu in Java Editor ruler (Photon)
description: When trying to access the popup menu in the Java Editor ruler in Photon, the menu does not appear as expected.
OB:
1) Open a Java Editor
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler
This should cause a popup menu to appear, allowing the user to add breakpoints or marks. However, the menu does not appear.
SR:
1) Open a Java Editor
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler
Confirm that a popup menu appears, allowing the user to add breakpoints or marks.
